prompt:
Imagine you, the COMMANDER, are an embodied agent in a simulated world. Your purpose is to instruct a robot, named DRIVER, to do tasks for
you by telling it what to do and interrupting it to give further instruction when necessary. Your job here is to predict when
you should be giving instructions to the DRIVER based on turn history with the DRIVER. If there is nothing to do or say, you
should just observe.

Dialogue histories may also include dialogue actions to further clarify the dialogue. A single
utterance may have one or more dialogue acts (most have only one). The possible dialogue acts are:

[
 'Acknowledge the other's utterance', # Category: Generic. Example: "perfect." Mostly follower
 'Affirm',      # Category: Generic. Example: "yes." Mostly commander
 'AlternateQuestions', # Category: Object/Location. Example: "yellow or blue mug?" Mostly follower
 'Confirm', # Category: Generic. Example: "Should I clean the cup?" Mostly follower
 'Deny',    # Category: Generic. Example: "no." Mostly commander
 'FeedbackNegative', # Category: feedback. Example: "that is not correct." Almost entirely commander
 'FeedbackPositive', # Category: feedback. Example: "great job." Almost entirely commander
 'Greetings/Salutations', # Category: Generic. Example: "hello." Even commander/follower
 'InformationOnObjectDetails', # Category: Object/Location. Example: "knife is behind the sink." Almost entirely commander
 'InformationOther', # Category: Generic. Example: "Mug is already clean." Mostly commander
 'Instruction', # Category: Instruction. Example: "fill the mug with coffee." Almost entirely commander
 'MiscOther', # Category: Generic. Example: "ta-da." Even commander/follower
 'NotifyFailure', # Category: Interface. Example. "not able to do that." Almost entirely follower
 'OtherInterfaceComment', # Category: Interface. Example: "which button opens drawer?" Even commander/follower
 'RequestForInstruction', # Category: Instruction. Example: "what should I do today?" Almost entirely follower
 'RequestForObjectLocationAndOtherDetails', # Category: Object/Location. Example: "where is the mug?" Almost entirely follower
 'RequestMore', # Category: Instruction. Example: "Is there anything else to do?" Almost entirely follower
 'RequestOtherInfo' # Category: Instruction. Example: "how many slices of tomato?" Almost entirely follower
]

Example :
Goal: Clean all the Pots.
COMMANDER: <observe>
DRIVER: how can i help? <<RequestForInstruction>>
COMMANDER: please clean all the pots <<Instruction>>
DRIVER: <observe>
COMMANDER: <observe>
DRIVER: <pickup Pot>
COMMANDER: that one looks clean, there's a dirty one on the counter by the toaster <<InformationOnObjectDetails>>
DRIVER: <observe>
COMMANDER: <observe>
DRIVER: <putdown CounterTop>
COMMANDER: <observe>
DRIVER: <pickup Pot>
COMMANDER response:
OBSERVE

Example :
Goal: Clean all the Cloths.
COMMANDER: <observe>
DRIVER: Hi. What should I do today? <<Greetings/Salutations,RequestForInstruction>>
COMMANDER: Hi <<Greetings/Salutations>>
DRIVER: <observe>
COMMANDER: Wash the cloth <<Instruction>>
DRIVER: <observe>
COMMANDER: <observe>
DRIVER: Where is the cloth? <<RequestForObjectLocationAndOtherDetails>>
COMMANDER: It's in ur front <<InformationOnObjectDetails>>
DRIVER: <observe>
COMMANDER: No <<Deny>>
DRIVER: <observe>
COMMANDER: Inside the wash basin <<InformationOnObjectDetails>>
DRIVER: <observe>
COMMANDER: turn left <<Instruction>>
DRIVER: <observe>
COMMANDER: <observe>
DRIVER: <toggle on ShowerHead>
COMMANDER response:
FeedbackPositive

Example :
Goal: Make a sandwich.
COMMANDER: <observe>
DRIVER: hi how can i help <<Greetings/Salutations,RequestForInstruction>>
COMMANDER: please find the bread in the fridge <<Instruction>>
DRIVER: <observe>
COMMANDER: <observe>
DRIVER: <open Fridge>
COMMANDER: <observe>
DRIVER: <pickup Bread>
COMMANDER: <observe>
DRIVER: <close Fridge>
COMMANDER response:
Instruction

Example :
Goal: Serve 1 slice(s) of Tomato on a Plate.
COMMANDER: hi <<Greetings/Salutations>>
DRIVER: <observe>
COMMANDER: <observe>
DRIVER: Hello <<Greetings/Salutations>>
COMMANDER: today you need to slice a tomato <<Instruction>>
DRIVER: <observe>
COMMANDER: <observe>
DRIVER: What's our first task? <<RequestForInstruction>>
COMMANDER: tomato is in the fridge <<InformationOnObjectDetails>>
DRIVER: <observe>
COMMANDER: <observe>
DRIVER: <open Fridge>
COMMANDER response:
OBSERVE

Example :
Goal: Cook 1 slice(s) of Potato and serve in a Bowl.
COMMANDER: <observe>
DRIVER: how can I help? <<RequestForInstruction>>
COMMANDER response:
Instruction

Your job is to respond to a given dialogue/action history with only one Dialogue act or OBSERVE.
Either return the dialogue act, or return the OBSERVE action. Return only one word/phrase.


Goal: Put all RemoteControl on one ArmChair.

COMMANDER response:

Imagine you, the COMMANDER, are an embodied agent in a simulated world. Your purpose is to instruct a robot, named DRIVER, to do tasks for
you by telling it what to do and interrupting it to give further instruction when necessary. Your job here is to predict when

Dialogue histories may also include dialogue actions to further clarify the dialogue. A single
utterance may have one or more dialogue acts (most have only one). The possible dialogue acts are:

[
 'Acknowledge the other's utterance', # Category: Generic. Example: "perfect." Mostly follower
 'Affirm',      # Category: Generic. Example: "yes." Mostly commander
 'AlternateQuestions', # Category: Object/Location. Example: "yellow or blue mug?" Mostly follower
 'Confirm', # Category: Generic. Example: "Should I clean the cup?" Mostly follower
 'Deny',    # Category: Generic. Example: "no." Mostly commander
 'FeedbackNegative', # Category: feedback. Example: "that is not correct." Almost entirely commander
 'FeedbackPositive', # Category: feedback. Example: "great job." Almost entirely commander
 'Greetings/Salutations', # Category: Generic. Example: "hello." Even commander/follower
 'InformationOnObjectDetails', # Category: Object/Location. Example: "knife is behind the sink." Almost entirely commander
 'InformationOther', # Category: Generic. Example: "Mug is already clean." Mostly commander
 'Instruction', # Category: Instruction. Example: "fill the mug with coffee." Almost entirely commander
 'MiscOther', # Category: Generic. Example: "ta-da." Even commander/follower
 'NotifyFailure', # Category: Interface. Example. "not able to do that." Almost entirely follower
 'OtherInterfaceComment', # Category: Interface. Example: "which button opens drawer?" Even commander/follower
 'RequestForInstruction', # Category: Instruction. Example: "what should I do today?" Almost entirely follower
 'RequestForObjectLocationAndOtherDetails', # Category: Object/Location. Example: "where is the mug?" Almost entirely follower
 'RequestMore', # Category: Instruction. Example: "Is there anything else to do?" Almost entirely follower
 'RequestOtherInfo' # Category: Instruction. Example: "how many slices of tomato?" Almost entirely follower
]

Example :
Goal: Clean all the Cloths.
COMMANDER: <observe>
DRIVER: What shall I do today? <<RequestForInstruction>>
COMMANDER: rinse the dirty clothe <<Instruction>>
DRIVER: <observe>
COMMANDER: the drawer where u stand <<InformationOnObjectDetails>>
DRIVER: <observe>
COMMANDER response:

Example :

DRIVER: hi how can i help <<Greetings/Salutations,RequestForInstruction>>

Example :
Goal: Prepare breakfast.
COMMANDER: <observe>
DRIVER: hi <<Greetings/Salutations>>
COMMANDER: Hi. Today we are making breakfast. First make coffee. The mug is next to the coffee maker <<Greetings/Salutations,Instruction,InformationOnObjectDetails>>
DRIVER: <observe>
COMMANDER: <observe>
DRIVER: ok <<Acknowledge>>
COMMANDER: <observe>
DRIVER: what next <<RequestForInstruction>>
COMMANDER: there is a tomato under the coffee pot. Please slice it <<InformationOnObjectDetails,Instruction>>
DRIVER: <observe>
COMMANDER response:
InformationOther

Example :
Goal: Make a salad.
COMMANDER: <observe>
DRIVER: hi what can i do for you today? <<Greetings/Salutations,RequestForInstruction>>
COMMANDER: I'd like you to make a salad <<Instruction>>
DRIVER: <observe>
COMMANDER: <observe>
DRIVER: sure, what kind of salad? <<Acknowledge,RequestOtherInfo>>
COMMANDER: sliced lettuce and two tomato slices <<Instruction>>
DRIVER: <observe>
COMMANDER: <observe>
DRIVER: <toggle off Faucet>
COMMANDER: <observe>
DRIVER: <open Cabinet>
COMMANDER: <observe>
DRIVER: <close Cabinet>
COMMANDER: <observe>
DRIVER: sure, where can i fine a knife? <<Acknowledge,RequestForObjectLocationAndOtherDetails>>
COMMANDER response:
InformationOnObjectDetails

DRIVER: <close Fridge>

DRIVER: <open Cabinet>
COMMANDER: <observe>

COMMANDER response:
OBSERVE

Imagine you, the COMMANDER, are an embodied agent in a simulated world. Your purpose is to instruct a robot, named DRIVER, to do tasks for
you by telling it what to do and interrupting it to give further instruction when necessary. Your job here is to predict when
you should be giving instructions to the DRIVER based on turn history with the DRIVER. If there is nothing to do or say, you
should just observe.

Dialogue histories may also include dialogue actions to further clarify the dialogue. A single
utterance may have one or more dialogue acts (most have only one). The possible dialogue acts are:

[
 'Acknowledge the other's utterance', # Category: Generic. Example: "perfect." Mostly follower
 'Affirm',      # Category: Generic. Example: "yes." Mostly commander
 'AlternateQuestions', # Category: Object/Location. Example: "yellow or blue mug?" Mostly follower
 'Confirm', # Category: Generic. Example: "Should I clean the cup?" Mostly follower
 'Deny',    # Category: Generic. Example: "no." Mostly commander
 'FeedbackNegative', # Category: feedback. Example: "that is not correct." Almost entirely commander
 'FeedbackPositive', # Category: feedback. Example: "great job." Almost entirely commander
 'Greetings/Salutations', # Category: Generic. Example: "hello." Even commander/follower
 'InformationOnObjectDetails', # Category: Object/Location. Example: "knife is behind the sink." Almost entirely commander
 'InformationOther', # Category: Generic. Example: "Mug is already clean." Mostly commander
 'Instruction', # Category: Instruction. Example: "fill the mug with coffee." Almost entirely commander
 'MiscOther', # Category: Generic. Example: "ta-da." Even commander/follower
 'NotifyFailure', # Category: Interface. Example. "not able to do that." Almost entirely follower
 'OtherInterfaceComment', # Category: Interface. Example: "which button opens drawer?" Even commander/follower
 'RequestForInstruction', # Category: Instruction. Example: "what should I do today?" Almost entirely follower
 'RequestForObjectLocationAndOtherDetails', # Category: Object/Location. Example: "where is the mug?" Almost entirely follower
 'RequestMore', # Category: Instruction. Example: "Is there anything else to do?" Almost entirely follower
 'RequestOtherInfo' # Category: Instruction. Example: "how many slices of tomato?" Almost entirely follower
]

DRIVER: <observe>
COMMANDER: <observe>

COMMANDER: <observe>
DRIVER: <pickup Knife>
COMMANDER response:
OBSERVE
